Particle.description: Settings to do with managing the particles that appear in the background

enabled.description: Enables or disables the particles on the background.

seasonal.description: To have the particles be based on the current season.

Date time.description: Settings to do with have the website is displayed during different times of the day.

enabled.description: Enables or disables the background automatically changing based on current time of day.

realistic.description: To have the background act like the current sky outside instead of a fixed 12 hour day/night.

default_state.description: The default time to set when time is not flowing

Debug.description: Settings to do with debugging, could cause website to load slower or things to break.

verbose.description: Enables all debugging in the console

verbose_loader.description: Enables all debugging for the `loader` class

verbose_Projects.description: Enables all debugging for the `Projects` class
